description: Updates the primary email for a user, group, or resource. The current email is moved into the list of aliases (or swapped between an existing alias and the current primary email), and the email provided in the input is promoted as the primary.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The organization that contains the user, group, or resource to update.

parameters.name: EntityId
parameters.description: The user, group, or resource to update. The identifier can accept UseriD, ResourceId, or GroupId, Username, Resourcename, or Groupname, or email. The following identity formats are available: Entity ID: 12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012, r-0123456789a0123456789b0123456789, or S-1-1-12-1234567890-123456789-123456789-1234 Email address: entity@domain.tld Entity name: entity.

parameters.name: Email
parameters.description: The value of the email to be updated as primary.
